content: 5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingot Low SerialHello everyone ! i hope you all are fine !!Welcome to all for this last 5oz GENESIS ingots auction ! Low Serial 5oz GENESIS ingots!Today are auctioned the ingots, 1-2-3-4-5-6-7-8-9as explained in the last auction, only 50 ingots were mint ! It's a 5oz fine silver 999.9 ingot! 95x75mm! on the face of this one you can see the legendary front page of The Times newspaper of January 3, 2009 with some modification to be adapted to the molding !At the back you can find the large version 1HoDLCLUB certification pad! the square next to this one at each laser-engraved BTC public address, each public key start with "1GENESiS.." ! in the center you can find the first made 1HoDLCLUB hologram(can be called the Genesis hologram) with it's window, and on the window you can see the number of the ingots and below the private key! !Each ingot is loaded with 0.021 BTC as shown on the rear of the ingot.Good luck to everyone !  5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingotMintage : 50  Material : 999.9 Fine SilverSize : 95x75mmThickness : 2.30mmWeight : 5ozDenomination : 0.021BTC Starting Bid : (the bidding don't include the loading)Each lot bears the serial number of the ingots at auctionLot#1 : 0.03BTCLot#2 : 0.03BTCLot#3 : 0.03BTCLot#4 : 0.03BTCLot#5 : 0.03BTCLot#6 : 0.03BTCLot#7 : 0.03BTCLot#8 : 0.03BTCLot#9 : 0.03BTCMinimum Bid Increments: 0.001BTCLoading : the loading amount of 0.021 BTC are not included in the bidding,it should be added to this one at the end of the auction during the payments!BTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngAuction Ends: July 13, 2022 @ 9pm UTCCountdown:5oz Fine Silver GENESIS ingot COUNTDOWNSniping:  No sniping, each bid in the final 15 minutes adds 15 minutes until no bid has been made for 15 minutesShipping: FREE [Priority + Tracking] Reference list :Code:Serial           BTC Address1 1GENESiSppnB16xbseCM344ZF26FFiLgLV2 1GENESiSQZnyJZajfjF94T46DBj4aFDopB3 1GENESiSKy1PZSFTdBgdu2JAV1qRS7apkq4 1GENESiSysMQgz9LdL4HAvzKnw5h9vxNuk5 1GENESiS9FpPDk5XaPM7iP39BvozjJDmD66 1GENESiSHQCKV4RDcE5b52aAdys4S5EZ4R7 1GENESiSMPwp8R3BLgzy1wuRJJd9iRxYyF8 1GENESiS274gUYPo6HR3gLRXXh9PzRzFSF9 1GENESiSkumbgMv4jFykgLutqDMUFqhGUM 1HoDLCLUB : https://1hodlclub.store OPEN!Twitter : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL Follow me
